backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend routing, import, and stability requirements with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend components, pages, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme tokens, and applying global background/text/border styles.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML template mounting the React app into a root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup with a root route, all page routes, and a styled NotFound component rendered via notFoundComponent.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Footer: Footer showing the Asistenku icon and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Header: Sticky header with logos and navigation buttons for login, layanan scroll, and partner registration.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Hero.t: Hero section with hero image, headline text, CTA button scrolling to layanan, and WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/JoinTe: Section inviting users to join the team with a button navigating to partner registration.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Landin: Landing page composing header, hero, layanan, join team, penutup, and footer sections.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/layana: Defines an array of service tier data with pricing, descriptions, and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Layana: Accordion-based layanan grid rendering layananData with details, pricing, and WhatsApp CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Penutu: Closing section with centered reassurance text about service quality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining global CSS variables for themes and applying base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/client/LoginClient.ts: Client login UI with Internet Identity button, workspace placeholder, and navigation to registration.
frontend/src/pages/client/RegisterClient: Client registration form handling basic user info and showing a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login UI with Internet Identity placeholder and role-based workspace navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Internal user registration form collecting basic info and role, showing a confirmation screen after submission.
Static partner login UI with placeholder Internet Identity button and navigation to registration.
frontend/src/pages/partner/RegisterPartn: Partner registration form capturing name, email, and WhatsApp, followed by a simple submitted-confirmation screen.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state file describing requirements, constraints, and notes for Asistenkuâ€™s static pages and routing setup.
